field.label: Enabled
field.help: This will enable or disable this zone.

field.label: Zone Name
field.help: Set the name for this zone. Both forward and reverse zones may be specified, i.e. example.com or 0.168.192.in-addr.arpa.

field.label: Allow Transfer
field.help: Define the ACLs where you allow which server can retrieve this zone.

field.label: Allow Query
field.help: Define the ACLs where you allow which client are allowed to query this zone.

field.label: TTL
field.help: Set the general Time To Live for this zone.

field.label: Refresh Time
field.help: Set the time in seconds after which name servers should refresh the zone information.

field.label: Retry Time
field.help: Set the time in seconds after which name servers should retry requests if the master does not respond.

field.label: Expire Time
field.help: Set the time in seconds after which name servers should stop answering requests if the master does not respond.

field.label: Negative TTL
field.help: Set the time in seconds after which an entry for a non-existent record should expire from cache.

field.label: Mail Admin
field.help: Set the mail address of zone admin. A @-sign will automatically be replaced with a dot in the zone data.

field.label: DNS Server
field.help: Set the DNS server hosting this file. This should usually be the FQDN of your firewall where the BIND plugin is installed.
